  • Constructor Details

      public AbstractLogger()

  • Method Details

    • setScenario

      public void setScenario(AbstractScenario scenario)
      Sets the scenario of the logger. Since logger is created in constructor of the scenario this should be set later.
      Parameters:
      scenario -

    • initialLog

      public abstract void initialLog()
      Starting log before starting simulation. Can be used for writing general information about the simulation parameters

    • logBeforeEvent

      public abstract void logBeforeEvent()
      Before each event this function will be called. This can be used to log information that emphasis on the changes each event causes.

    • logAfterEvent

      public abstract void logAfterEvent()
      This function will be called after each event. Most information should be logged using this function.

    • finalLog

      public abstract void finalLog() throws IOException
      At the end of the scenario this function will be called and can be used for logging info that concludes and show results.
      Throws:
      IOException
